name: DRUKI Gofin Form File
summary: A GOFIN file contains a form created by DRUKI Gofin, a Polish program used to create and print legal forms and contracts. It stores a form that a user fills out, which can then be printed or exported to the .PDF format. GOFIN files are used for various legal purposes, such as tax forms, budget accounting, health and safety, and environmental protection.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
